00001 #include <epi.h>
00002 
00003 #define EPI_MAP_LINEAR 1
00004 
00005 /*
00006  * epi.c -- defines the 4 simulation engine void * functions required for
00007  *              execution of the model.  Contains the main function.
00008  */
00009 
00010 #define TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS 86400
00011 
00012 /*
00013  * epi_init - initialize node LPs state variables
00014  * 
00015  * state        - our node LP state space
00016  * lp           - our node LP
00017  */
00018 void
00019 epi_init(epi_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00020 {
00021         epi_agent       *a = pq_top(state->pq);
00022 
00023         // agents mapped to LP?
00024         if(!a)
00025         {
00026                 // NOTE: If not home assumed to be work
00027                 // No check for school, etc.
00028                 state->grid_type = EPI_GRID_OFFICE_1;
00029                 return;
00030         }
00031 
00032         state->grid_type = EPI_GRID_HOME;
00033 
00034         // agents will not have a remove time of zero.
00035         // set timer for minimum of ts_remove and ts_stage_tran with
00036         // appropriate event type.  EPI_STAGE_TRANSITION has priority.
00037         if (a->ts_stage_tran <= a->ts_remove)
00038         {
00039                 state->tmr_remove = rn_timer_init(lp, a->ts_stage_tran);
00040                 a->e_type = EPI_STAGE_TRANSITION;
00041         } else
00042         {
00043                 state->tmr_remove = rn_timer_init(lp, a->dur[0]);
00044                 a->e_type = EPI_REMOVE;
00045         }
00046 
00047         if(state->tmr_remove)
00048                 state->tmr_remove->memory = (tw_memory *) a;
00049 //      else
00050 //              tw_error("tmr_remove at lp %ld for agent %u is NULL\n", lp->id, a->id);
00051         //printf("%ld: TMR for %u at %lf\n", lp->id, a->id, state->tmr_remove->recv_ts);
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * epi_event_handler - main event processing (per node LP)
00056  * 
00057  * state        - our node LP state space
00058  * bf           - a bitfield provided by the simulation ecxecutive
00059  * m            - the incoming event or message
00060  * lp           - our node LP
00061  */
00062 void
00063 epi_event_handler(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00064 {
00065         epi_agent       *a;
00066         int              today;
00067 
00068         // TO DO: need to check for last day to get last day of statistics
00069         today = (int) (tw_now(lp) / TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS);
00070         if( today > g_epi_day)
00071         {
00072                 // report yesterday's statistics
00073                 epi_report_census_tract(); 
00074                 g_epi_day++;
00075         }
00076 
00077         tw_stime delta_time = tw_now(lp) - state->last_event;
00078 
00079         if(NULL == (a = (epi_agent *) tw_event_memory_get(lp)))
00080                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "No agent on event!");
00081 
00082         *(int *) bf = 0;
00083 
00084         switch(a->e_type)
00085         {
00086                 case EPI_ADD:
00087                         // compute SEIR for existing, then add agent to LP
00088                         // skip seir if no time has passed
00089                         if ( (state->ncontagious > 0) && (EPSILON < delta_time) )
00090                                 epi_seir_compute(state, bf, a, lp);
00091 
00092                         epi_agent_add(state, bf, a, lp);
00093                         epi_num_add(state, bf, a, lp);
00094                         break;
00095                 case EPI_REMOVE:
00096                         // compute SEIR for all, then remove agent from LP
00097                         // skip seir if no time has passed
00098                         if((state->ncontagious > 0) && (EPSILON < delta_time))
00099                                 epi_seir_compute(state, bf, a, lp);
00100 
00101                         if (epi_agent_remove(state, bf, a, lp))
00102                                 epi_num_remove(state, bf, a, lp);
00103 
00104                         break;
00105                 case EPI_STAGE_TRANSITION:
00106                         // compute seir for all, then change stage for agent
00107                         // skip seir if no time has passed
00108                         if( (state->ncontagious > 0) && (EPSILON < delta_time) )
00109                                 epi_seir_compute(state, bf, a, lp);
00110 
00111                         epi_agent_stage_tran(state, bf, a, lp);
00112                         break;
00113                 default:
00114                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unhandled event message!");
00115         }
00116 
00117         state->last_event = tw_now(lp);
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*
00121  * epi_rc_event_handler - reverse compute effects of out-of-order events
00122  *                        + rollback LP random number generators
00123  *                        + restore LP state variables

00125  * state        - our node LP state space
00126  * bf           - a bitfield provided by the simulation ecxecutive

00128  * lp           - our node LP
00129  */
00130 void
00131 epi_rc_event_handler(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00132 {
00133 }

00135 /*
00136  * epi_final - finalize node LP statistics / outputting
00137  * 
00138  * state        - our node LP state space
00139  * lp           - our node LP
00140  */
00141 void
00142 epi_final(epi_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00143 {
00144         if(g_epi_day)
00145         {
00146                 epi_report_census_tract(); 
00147                 g_epi_day = 0;
00148         }
00149 
00150         g_epi_stats->s_move_ev += state->stats->s_move_ev;
00151         g_epi_stats->s_nchecked += state->stats->s_nchecked;
00152         g_epi_stats->s_ndraws += state->stats->s_ndraws;
00153         g_epi_stats->s_ninfected += state->stats->s_ninfected;
00154         g_epi_stats->s_ndead += state->stats->s_ndead;
00155 }
